commit.message:
Do not instantiate default definitions in instantiate_scev_name.

2010-07-22  Sebastian Pop  <sebastian.pop@amd.com>

	* tree-scalar-evolution.c (instantiate_scev_name): Do not
	instantiate default definitions.

From-SVN: r163155
